WorkItem.Description:
Returns Invalid Handle Value
I have x64 and compiled everything for "AnyCPU"
I started the Demo Application and wanted to play back the downloaded file (downloaded from: http://dl.cgmm.de/Roger%20Liebi/Wahrheit%20Irrtum/01%20Roger%20Liebi%20-%20Wahrheit%20oder%20Irrtum%20(Teil%201).mp3 )

Error while call to: acmStreamPrepareHeader

Comments.Message: you need to compile for x86 only if you want to use ACM
latest source can now successfully play MP3s using ACM in x64 mode
